objects.text:
APPLE WATCH SERIES
FIRE BLOOM DISPLAY

• Premium OLED with dynamic fire effect
• Sleek space gray aluminum case
• Water-resistant & scratch-proof design
Limited time offer. Be the first!

product_details.name: Elegant Apple Watch Series - Stunning Fire Bloom Display Face
product_details.description:
• Premium OLED display with vibrant fire bloom watch face design
• Sleek space gray aluminum case with seamless glass integration
• Comfortable black sport band made from high-quality fluoroelastomer
• Crystal clear Retina display with stunning visual effects
• Digital crown for precise navigation and control
• Water-resistant design for everyday use
• Customizable watch face with dynamic fire effect animation
• Perfect blend of fashion and technology
• Durable scratch-resistant screen
• Compatible with all standard Apple Watch bands

banner_details:
This visually striking banner is split into two sections with a vertical divider: the left showcasing informative text elements, and the right featuring a high-resolution product image of a smart watch with a fiery bloom display. The background transitions from deep black to charcoal, accented with subtle blue glowing circles and white spark-like dots for a futuristic appeal. The focal headline (`heading`) is bold and futuristic, followed by a promotional tagline (`tagline`) in electric blue. A subheading (`subheading`) introduces the product series, with feature highlights (`description`) listed below. The pricing (`price`) in bold blue draws attention, complemented by a small encouragement text (`offer_text`). A bright call-to-action button (`cta_button`) labeled (`cta`) prompts immediate engagement. 

**Color Palette:**
- #000000 (Black background)
- #111112 (Charcoal gray accent)
- #2a55e5 (Electric Blue - highlights, price, CTA)
- #f0f2f5 (Off-white - descriptions/detail text)
- #ffffff (White - primary text, CTA text)
- #333333 (Subtle divider line)
product_color: The product image features a sophisticated smartwatch with a sleek, deep black band and casing, lending a modern and minimalistic aesthetic. The watch face displays an abstract, molten amber and golden pattern that radiates from the center, contrasted beautifully against the black background. This dynamic blending of colors creates a sense of movement and energy. The glowing gold second hand and white minute and hour hands stand out sharply, enhancing visibility. A suitable color palette for an advertisement banner would include: Jet Black (#0A0A0A), Charcoal Gray (#2E2E2E), Molten Amber (#CC7722), Gold Flame (#D8741F), and Soft White (#F5F5F5).
